name: FALL!NG
description:
Instructions:

Collect all KARMA to reach the next level. FALL!NG - Escape your subconscious mind by falling deeper and deeper into the unknown of your soul. Unlock secret potential of your Yin and yang.

A 3D first-person shooter built with love in A-Frame.

A HTML5 video game by Sara Ferro & Chris Weil

for Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop and PC,

running on Windows, Mac, Linux, Android and iOS.

CLICK HERE TO PLAY ON MOBILE

Thanks for playing! Enjoy :)
